remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Courier/ Supernumerary compartment remains unoccupied.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: The Courier/ Supernumerary compartment must remain unoccupied.

placard.para: Placard near Captain’s Audio Selector panel "PASSENGER ADDRESS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
